Pesquise a data da mais recente aquisi\u.QUERY:
SELECT MAX(DAT.FullDateAlternateKey) AS DateLastPurchase
FROM FactInternetSales FACT
LEFT JOIN DimDate DAT
ON DAT.DateKey = FACT.OrderDateKey
LEFT JOIN DimCustomer CUST 
ON FACT.CustomerKey = CUST.CustomerKey WHERE FIRSTNAME='David' AND LASTNAME='Taylor'

Qual a categoria que tem mais produtos a.QUERY:
select CATG.EnglishProductCategoryName , count(*) AS QNT
 from DimProduct as PRD
 left join DimProductSubcategory as SUBCATG
 on PRD.ProductSubcategoryKey = SUBCATG.ProductSubcategoryKey
  left join DimProductCategory as CATG
 on SUBCATG.ProductCategoryKey = CATG.ProductCategoryKey
 GROUP BY CATG.EnglishProductCategoryName 
 ORDER BY 2 DESC 
 LIMIT 1

Qual a media de custo padrao dos produto.QUERY:

 from DimProduct as PRD
 left join DimProductSubcategory as SUBCATG
 on PRD.ProductSubcategoryKey = SUBCATG.ProductSubcategoryKey
  left join DimProductCategory as CATG
 on SUBCATG.ProductCategoryKey = CATG.ProductCategoryKey
WHERE CATG.EnglishProductCategoryName = 'Bikes'

  left join DimProductCategory as CATG
 on SUBCATG.ProductCategoryKey = CATG.ProductCategoryKey
WHERE CATG.EnglishProductCategoryName = 'Acessories'

O dia do facao.QUERY:
SELECT EndDate, COUNT(*) 
FROM DIMEMPLOYEE
group by EndDate

order by  2 DESC
limit 1

Que dia que teve mais cortes?.QUERY:
SELECT EndDate, COUNT(*) 
FROM DIMEMPLOYEE
group by EndDate

order by  2 DESC
limit 1

Que dia que teve mais contratacoes.QUERY:
SELECT HireDate, COUNT(*) 
FROM DIMEMPLOYEE
group by HireDate

order by  2 DESC
limit 1

Que dia que iniciaram as contratacoes.QUERY:
SELECT HireDate
FROM DIMEMPLOYEE
group by HireDate

order by  1 
limit 1

Quando que aconteceu a primeira demissao.QUERY:
SELECT EndDate
FROM DIMEMPLOYEE
group by EndDate

order by  1 DESC
limit 1

Que dia que foi que contrataram pela ult.QUERY:
SELECT HireDate
FROM DIMEMPLOYEE
group by HireDate

order by  1 DESC
limit 1

Quando aconteceu a ultima demissao?.QUERY:
select EndDate from DimEmployee
ORDER BY
    EndDate desc
limit 1;

Ultima contratacao.QUERY:
SELECT HireDate
FROM DIMEMPLOYEE
group by HireDate

order by  1 DESC
limit 1

A quanto tempo o Rostislav Shabalin trab.QUERY:
SELECT 
Cast ((
    julianday('now') - JulianDay(HireDate)
) As Integer) AS TempoDeTrabalho
FROM DimEmployee
WHERE  FIRSTNAME='Rostislav ' AND LASTNAME='Shabalin'

Quanto tempo de casa Pat Coleman tem?.QUERY:
SELECT 
Cast ((
    julianday('now') - JulianDay(HireDate)
) As Integer) AS TempoDeTrabalho
FROM DimEmployee
WHERE  FIRSTNAME='Pat' AND LASTNAME='Coleman'
